title: Project: Expression Perfection
introduction: Introducing Expression Perfection. This innovative addon brings emojis to the Minecraft world, revolutionizing communication and creativity. From smiles to tears, it offers a whole new way to express emotions as you build, mine, and explore. Get ready to enhance your in-game interactions with a plethora of emojis, adding a touch of fun and immersion to your Minecraft experience.

content.text: To get started, you need to know the emoji namespace, you can search the namespace by using :emoji:number command! In this image, we do :emoji:1 to show the first 10 emoji! You can do :emoji:1 :emoji:2 :emoji:3 etc to see more emoji!
Now, the emoji and their namespaces will appear in your chat dialog!
Let's send a Hello message with the :smile: emoji, shall we?
The final message will be just like this! A smile emoji!
It also works on Sign too! If it's not working, please stare your cursor at sign! The game may take a while to load the new emoji
Using the anvil to rename the item with emoji will work too! Let's prepare some flower!

postwarning: WARNING:  This Addon requires Beta APIs experimental to work properly!
